description: This lexicon is in a not officially released state. It is subject to change. | Retrieves a play via an author DID and record key.

authorDID.description: The author's DID for the play

rkey.description: The record key of the play

trackMbId.description: The Musicbrainz ID of the track

recordingMbId.description: The Musicbrainz recording ID of the track

duration.description: The length of the track in seconds

isrc.description: The ISRC code associated with the recording

originUrl.description: The URL associated with this track

musicServiceBaseDomain.description: The base domain of the music service. e.g. music.apple.com, tidal.com, spotify.com. Defaults to 'local' if not provided.

submissionClientAgent.description: A user-agent style string specifying the user agent. e.g. tealtracker/0.0.1b (Linux; Android 13; SM-A715F). Defaults to 'manual/unknown' if not provided.

playedTime.description: The unix timestamp of when the track was played
